text: Hey folks, TribalScale is hiring mobile engineers for the Toronto, LA and Dubai area. TribalScale is a mobile services company and we work with a lot of Top 100 Fortunes company like NFL, Disney, PGA, etc... and build their mobile platform/products. If you are interested or know someone who might be, let's have a chat :slightly_smiling_face: <http://www.tribalscale.com/careers.html>

attachments.title: TribalScale
attachments.text: TribalScale is a mobile first company that specializes in connected devices and the Internet of Things. Our team-members have a history of partnering with some of the world's most premium brands, helping to shepherd businesses into the connected age.
